SELECT wi.* FROM wodInfo as wi JOIN fileData AS fd ON wi.idx = fd.pIdx WHERE wi.isOpen = 'Y' and fd.fileKind='C' and fd.tableLinkIdx=37
ORDER BY wi.lastUpdatetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM stadion_db_dev.wodInfo WHERE progressDate = CURDATE() ORDER BY orderNo ASC;
SELECT name FROM wodInfo WHERE (wodInfo.name like #{keyword} OR wodInfo.progressDate like #{keyword} )
SELECT wodInfo.idx, name FROM wodInfo WHERE (wodInfo.name like #{keyword} OR wodInfo.progressDate like #{keyword} ) order by name
SELECT * FROM wodInfo WHERE (wodInfo.name like #{keyword} OR wodInfo.progressDate like #{keyword} ) order by name

SELECT wi.*, fd.filePath, fd.fileNameThumb FROM wodInfo as wi JOIN fileData AS fd ON wi.idx = fd.pIdx WHERE wi.isOpen = 'Y' and fd.fileKind='C' and fd.tableLinkIdx=37 and progressDate=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY wi.lastUpdatetime DESC;

SELECT wi.*, fd.filePath, fd.fileNameThumb FROM wodInfo as wi JOIN fileData AS fd ON wi.idx = fd.pIdx WHERE wi.isOpen = 'Y' and fd.fileKind='C' and fd.tableLinkIdx=37 and progressDate=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL+1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY wi.lastUpdatetime DESC;

SELECT wi.*, fd.filePath, fd.fileNameThumb FROM wodInfo as wi JOIN fileData AS fd ON wi.idx = fd.pIdx WHERE wi.isOpen = 'Y' and fd.fileKind='C' and fd.tableLinkIdx=37 and DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(wi.progressDate, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') ORDER BY wi.lastUpdatetime DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT wi.*, fd.filePath, fd.fileNameThumb, wbi.boxIdx FROM wodBoxLinkInfo as wbi, wodInfo as wi
LEFT JOIN fileData AS fd ON wi.idx = fd.pIdx and fd.fileKind='C' and fd.tableLinkIdx=37 LEFT JOIN wodBoxLinkInfo AS bi ON wi.idx = bi.wodIdx WHERE wi.isOpen = 'Y' and wi.idx = fd.pIdx and wi.idx = wbi.wodIdx and wbi.boxIdx = #{boxIdx} and DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(wi.progressDate, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m') ORDER BY wi.lastUpdatetime DESC;

SELECT wi.*, fd.filePath, fd.fileNameThumb FROM wodInfo as wi JOIN fileData AS fd ON wi.idx = fd.pIdx WHERE wi.isOpen = 'Y' and fd.fileKind='C' and fd.tableLinkIdx=37 and wi.idx=#{idx}
ORDER BY wi.lastUpdatetime DESC LIMIT 1;
